entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Bracebridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 3:57 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 3.8°C
Pressure: 99.3 kPa
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 2.8°C
Wind: W 24 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this evening then cloudy. A few flurries beginning overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the evening. Blowing snow in the evening and after midnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
